modifiers.data: Tick delay between inspection updates (minimum 5 ticks)

modifiers.data: BossBar color used during /tw protection inspect

modifiers.name: help
modifiers.data: Display chat messages when a player is denied an action

modifiers.name: help
modifiers.data: Send denied messages to the player's chat

modifiers.name: help
modifiers.data: Send denied messages to the action bar

modifiers.name: help
modifiers.data: Send denied messages via a temporary boss bar

modifiers.name: help
modifiers.data: Send custom flag messages to the player's chat

modifiers.name: help
modifiers.data: Send custom flag messages to the action bar

modifiers.name: help
modifiers.data: Send custom flag messages via a temporary boss bar

modifiers.name: help
modifiers.data: Duration in ticks before boss bar messages disappear (minimum 20 ticks)

modifiers.name: help
modifiers.data: MiniMessage template for denied action messages. Use {reason} for the raw reason and {reason_line} for ': reason'.

modifiers.name: help
modifiers.data: Advanced MiniMessage templates used for denied feedback and inspection mode. Supports placeholders documented in the protection guide.

modifiers.name: help
modifiers.data: Denied action template. Placeholders: {reason}, {reason_line} (prefixed with ': ' when reason available).

modifiers.name: help
modifiers.data: Denied entry template. Placeholders: {region}, {flag}.

modifiers.name: help
modifiers.data: Action bar feedback when inspection is enabled.

modifiers.name: help
modifiers.data: Action bar feedback when inspection is disabled.

modifiers.name: help
modifiers.data: BossBar title displayed while the inspection session initializes.

modifiers.name: help
modifiers.data: Action bar message displayed when no regions are active during inspection.

modifiers.name: help
modifiers.data: BossBar title displayed when no regions are active during inspection.

modifiers.name: help
modifiers.data: Prefix for the inspection action bar. Placeholders: {priority}, {region}.

modifiers.name: help
modifiers.data: Action bar fallback when the dominant region exposes no active flags.

modifiers.name: help
modifiers.data: Action bar entry for each flag. Placeholders: {flag}, {value}, {inherited}, {overrides}.

modifiers.name: help
modifiers.data: Separator between flag entries in the inspection action bar.

modifiers.name: help
modifiers.data: Suffix appended when additional flag previews are truncated.

modifiers.name: help
modifiers.data: Suffix appended when additional regions overlap. Placeholder: {count}.

modifiers.name: help
modifiers.data: Indicator appended to action bar details when a flag is inherited.

modifiers.name: help
modifiers.data: Indicator appended to action bar details when a flag overrides its parent.

modifiers.name: help
modifiers.data: BossBar title template per region. Placeholders: {index}, {total}, {priority}, {region}, {flags}, {summary}.

modifiers.name: help
modifiers.data: BossBar summary when a region exposes no effective flags.

modifiers.name: help
modifiers.data: Base summary fragment. Placeholders: {active}, {local}.

modifiers.name: help
modifiers.data: Summary fragment appended when inherited flags exist. Placeholder: {count}.

modifiers.name: help
modifiers.data: Summary fragment appended when overrides exist. Placeholder: {count}.

modifiers.name: help
modifiers.data: Prefix inserted before the boss bar flag detail list.

modifiers.name: help
modifiers.data: BossBar detail entry per flag. Placeholders: {flag}, {value}, {inherited}, {overrides}.

modifiers.name: help
modifiers.data: Separator between boss bar flag details.

modifiers.name: help
modifiers.data: Suffix appended when boss bar flag details are truncated.

modifiers.name: help
modifiers.data: Indicator appended to boss bar flag details when inherited.

modifiers.name: help
modifiers.data: Indicator appended to boss bar flag details when overriding a parent value.

modifiers.name: help
modifiers.data: Configure all in-game messages used by protection tools. Supports MiniMessage formatting and placeholders documented in the Protection guide.

entries.name: protection_region_audience
entries.description: Filter players based on if they are in a protection region

modifiers.data: audience

modifiers.name: entry
modifiers.data: protection_region

modifiers.name: help
modifiers.data: Region definition that should be considered by this audience filter

modifiers.name: help
modifiers.data: The audience will be the players that do not match the criteria.

extension.name: Protection
extension.description:
Provides a full-featured region engine with flag presets, selection tools and
Paper/Folia-safe runtime enforcement so BornToCraft servers can drop the
WorldGuard + ExtraFlags dependency entirely.
